title: azindiDum inbattil
sahitya:
azhindiDum inbattil azhundudal ozhivAi AnandamE nalgum aritanai ninaivAi


anupallavi

  pozhindiDum aruL mukhil pOnra parandAman pongudA maraiyaDi pOTruvAi inimEl


caraNam    maruL iruT-sherivinai mAittiDum param shuDar mAdhvan gOvindan malar maghaL tuNaivn 
shuruL alai pArkkaDal tuyinriDum periyOn tuyarellAm kaLibavan tuNaiyaDi pOTruvAi
